main event: USAF pilots and observers reported sightings of unidentified flying objects in Denver, Colorado on several occasions in September 1950.
interesting points: Multiple sightings were reported between September 22 and September 28, 1950, including circular objects hovering and maneuvering at high speeds,One object was estimated to be 45-50 feet in diameter with impressive speed and agility,Observations were made by credible witnesses including USAF officers,Some sightings lasted from 10 to 30 minutes, The characteristics of the objects included brilliant white to orange-red colors and unusual maneuvers like rapid acceleration and altitude changes.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects described as circular in shape
witness description: USAF pilots and Air Force observers
